title: 'Quick Hits' With LaDainian Tomlinson (Ep. 91)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark talks to NFL Hall of Famer LaDainian Tomlinson about his new position as special assistant to the owner of the Los Angeles Chargers (01:00), winning fans over in L.A. (03:00), leaving San Diego (05:00), the evolution of playing running back in the NFL (09:00), his post-retirement training regime (12:30), and Colin Kaepernick (13:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
